snippet.title: Longplay of Hexen: Beyond Heretic
snippet.description:
Longplay of Hexen: Beyond Heretic, played on MS-DOS. This game's version was released on Oct. 30th, 1995. Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

0:00:00 - Start
0:00:13 - Winnowing Hall
0:04:31 - Hub 1: Seven Portals
0:40:58 - Bright Crucible (Secret Level)
0:51:05 - Hub 2: Shadow Wood
1:36:27 - Sacred Grove (Secret Level)
1:44:17 - Hub 3: Heresiarch's Seminary
2:31:11 - Heresiarch (Boss Fight)
2:32:29 - Deathwind Chapel  (Secret Level)
2:40:07 - Hub 4: Castle of Grief
2:51:30 - Desolate Garden (Secret Level)
3:29:11 - Hub 5: Necropolis
3:30:15 - Vivarium  (Secret Level)
3:59:47 - Korax (Boss fight)
4:03:58 - Ending

By: Retro Game Spacko
